English.Text: Praise be, a secret passage! One of the men is unexpectedly knowledgeable on Mesoan theology. "That symbol's in my improving bunk book sir, Cap'n, sirâ€” means god of the underworld." Sure enough, in a nearby rock face is a gap scarcely wide enough to slip through, that might easily have been missed. One-by-one the expedition enters to find themselves in a natural cavern, through which a cool wind whips. A little light reveals a rock fall blocking the way ahead, and crawlways branching in all directions.
